mapper.insert: insert into deliveryplace (dePID, dePName, provinceID, cityID, mgID, dePTel, dePAddr, Comment) values (#{depid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update deliveryplace set dePName = #{depname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provinceID = #{provinceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cityID = #{cityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mgID = #{mgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dePTel = #{deptel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dePAddr = #{depaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dePID = #{depid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select dePID, dePName, provinceID, cityID, mgID, dePTel, dePAddr, Comment from deliveryplace
